def: Producing, or secreting, sweat; sudoriparous. Sudoriferousglands (Anat.), small convoluted tubular glands which are situated inthe subcutaneous tissues and discharge by minute orifices in thesurface of the skin; the sweat glands.
A kind of coarse blanket or garment used by the North AmericanIndians.
Having seeds grooved lengthwise on the inner face, as in sweetcicely.

To count; to tell by numbers; to count over, or tell off oneafter another; to number; to reckon up; to mention one by one; toname over; to make a special and separate account of; to recount; as,to enumerate the stars in a constellation.Enumerating the services he had done. Ludlow.
A poem in honor of a virgin. [Obs.]
Done by express direction; not involuntary; communded. [Obs.]Those imperate acts, wherein we see the empire of the soul. Sir M.Hale.
Of or relating to a court; judicial. [Obs.]His last offenses to us Shall have judicious hearing. Shak.
A somersault made with the assistance of the hands placed uponthe ground.
